ComicInfo.Title: Circus People
ComicInfo.Summary: Circus People: Under the influence of the Ringmaster, Bruce continues the search for Betty's killer in Las Vegas and runs into the Circus of Crime. Dr. Spar finds Rick on the verge of death due to illness, and contacts the Avengers to help him.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
